mapper.select: select name,price,img from c_skincare where id=#{id}
select c.*,s.typename from c_skincare c inner join c_skintype s on c.skintypeid = s.id where s.id= #{id}
select c.*,b.brandname from c_skincare c inner join c_brandtype b on c.brandid = b.id where b.id= #{id}
select c.*,b.efficacyname from c_skincare c inner join c_efficacytype b on c.efficacyid = b.id where b.id= #{id}
select * from c_skincare order by price asc
select * from c_skincare order by price desc
select c.*,b.typename from c_skincare c inner join c_type b on c.typeId = b.id where b.id= #{id}
